net.unicon.springframework.properties

Interface ReloadableProperties

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReloadablePropertiesBase

    public interface ReloadableProperties
    For Properties maps that notify about changes. Would extend interface java.util.Properties if it were an interface. Classes implementing this interface should consider extending DelegatingProperties.
